data.name: aboutShipping.Text
data.value:
DOWNLOADING IMAGES:
Upon purchase, lower resolution images are available for immediate download. Higher resolutions may take longer before downloads are available. Please allow about 1 hour for every 3 images purchased.

CORBIS FTP:
Corbis will notify you via email when your images are ready to download from our FTP site. Please allow approximately 1 hours for every 3 images purchased.

EMAIL DELIVERY:
Corbis will notify you via email when your images are ready. Additional delivery charges may apply.

data.name: cookiesDetailText.Text
data.value: When you visit the Corbis web site, a small file called a cookie will be saved on your computer's hard drive. Cookies allow Corbis to make its web site more useful by storing information about your preferences. For example, if you select images and add them to your Shopping Cart, Corbis uses the cookie to decide where they are stored. Cookies do not personally identify an Internet user, although they do identify a user's computer. You can set your browser's option not to accept cookies; however, by doing so, you may not be able to access all of the features on the site.

data.name: corbisPolicyPara1.Text
data.value: Corbis retains the right to share membership information with Corbis' partners or affiliates, to enable them to provide you with special benefits, offers, or promotions. You will not receive this information if you choose to unsubscribe or decline to receive updates.

data.name: corbisPolicyPara2.Text
data.value: Your account information is used by Corbis to create personalized content, services, and advertising on the Corbis web site. Corbis also aggregates your website activity so that we may better understand the users that are visiting our site. For example, we may produce reports on the most popular search terms by collecting general search term data based on individual searches. However, this aggregate data is anonymous and does not contain any personally identifiable information.

data.name: emailNotificationText.Text
data.value: Corbis may send you email to notify you about your recent order. Corbis may also send you email to inform you about Corbis offers, updates, features, as well as offers, updates, and features of our affiliates and partners. Corbis does not rent or sell email lists. You may, of course, choose at any time to not receive email from Corbis by sending a request to

data.name: encryptionPolicyText.Text
data.value: All payment information that you submit to Corbis is encrypted using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology. If you use the payment services of any of our online partners, please consult their privacy policies for any questions about their use of your payment information.

data.name: internalPurposesMessage.Text
data.value: Corbis does not sell or rent information about our customers to third parties. We use the information that you supply to us for internal purposes to:

data.name: maintainUpdateAccountText.Text
data.value: maintain or update your Corbis account

data.name: privacyPolicyCoveringAreas.Text
data.value: Corbis adheres to strict accounts security and privacy practices, covering these areas:

data.name: privacyPolicyMessage.Text
data.value: At Corbis, we understand and respect your concerns regarding security and the privacy of any information you supply while visiting our web site. We believe that knowledge is the key to monitoring and protecting how your information is used on the Internet. If you have questions about this privacy policy or concerns about personal information you have supplied please contact Corbis customer service or your account representative.

data.name: sendSpecialOffers.Text
data.value: send you updates about special offers, new services, special promotions, and noteworthy news and events

data.name: agessaMsg.Text
data.value: The amounts stated here do not include the social security contributions, which you may need to pay to Agessa. If you must pay these social security contributions, they will be specified on the invoice, which will be sent to your billing address.

data.name: taxErrorMsg.Text
data.value: Tax could not be calculated for your order at this time. The correct tax amount will be displayed on your invoice.
